text: Brush is a small city in Morgan County, Colorado, USA. The population was 5,339 in 2020. == Education == There are two elementary schools and a combined junior and senior high school campus for the children of Brush. == Clubs == Brush sports teams have had a number of successes. In 2023, four members of the archery club qualified for the national competition. == References == Category:Cities in Colorado
title: Brush, Colorado
